TopicTitle: Requesting Aid from a real life pilot!

Articles.Content:
I am requesting to have a one on one discussion with a real life pilot, specifically if possible, a helicopter pilot (or someone with helicopter flight experience). I have several flights questions and I would like someone who has past their flight exams to help me with something I'm about to host.

Thank you for helping !

I am available on Here via PM, or Steam, IRC (I have a private server we can use), and Skype.
I can transmit your questions to my dad (helicopter pilot with decades of flight practice).

I can transmit your questions to my dad (helicopter pilot with decades of flight practice).

Your offer is great, but I'd like to refer to something in KSP so someone with a little flight experience there is also desirable. Thanks though!!
